```{r}

single_selection <- function(data, q.name)
  {
  responses <- 
    data %>%
    select(id = Respondent.ID, question = q.name) %>%
    slice(2:nrow(.))
  
  return(responses)
  }

```

```{r}
# Pull information for only this question out of each survey
# - Rename columns
# - Drop first row (first row contained column names)
# - Add survey source as a variable

    ## General

general <- 
  raw_data_general %>%
  select(
    id = Respondent.ID,
    condition = "Which.of.the.following.health.conditions.do.you.face.and.or.have.been.diagnosed.with...Please.select.all.that.apply.",
         "X":"X.25")

colnames(general) <- general[1, ]
general <- general[-1, ]
general <- 
  general %>% 
  rename(id = 1) %>%
  inner_join(
    single_selection(data = raw_data_general, q.name = "What.is.your.age..in.years..")
    ) %>%
  mutate(source = 'general')





```
